div.div: Questions about COVID-19 now being answered by Louisiana 211. Anyone looking for information about the the outbreak can simply dial 211 or text the keyword LACOVID to 898-211 for the most current information...... Read on...

h4.a: Low Income Housing Energy Assistance Program

div.div:
Attention Assumption Parish Residents
NEED ASSISTANCE WITH YOUR ENERGY BILL!!!
The Assumption Parish Police Jury Department of Housing and Community Development would like to announce availability of Low Income Home Energy Assistance Program funding. Read on...
We offer indoor walking at the Assumption Parish Community Center. Check back weekly for an updated schedule. Read on...
